professionalProjects.title: Catalog Enrichment
professionalProjects.description: Built end-to-end pipelines using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and LLMs to enrich product metadata and classify taxonomy across diverse e-commerce platforms. Designed scalable ETL pipelines in Databricks, orchestrated Snowflake workloads, and deployed solutions via Azure for near real-time enrichment.

professionalProjects.title: NeuroThink Research
professionalProjects.description: Working on computational neuroscience research and AI platform tools. Developing advanced models for neural network analysis and simulation within the computational neuroscience space.

personalProjects.title: Tree-LSTM Semantic Visualizer
personalProjects.description: An interactive tool for visualizing compositional semantics through constituency parse trees and Tree-LSTM networks. Combines constituency parsing via spaCy/Benepar, contextual embeddings via BERT, and compositional semantics via Child-Sum Tree-LSTM with interactive 2D and 3D visualizations.
